abstract: The police in Zimbabwe arrested three women accused of sexual attacks on male hitchhikers over the past two years.
snippet: The police in Zimbabwe arrested three women accused of sexual attacks on male hitchhikers over the past two years.
lead_paragraph: The police in Zimbabwe on Friday charged three women in connection with a spate of sexual attacks on male hitchhikers over the past two years, CNN reports.

headline.main: Zimbabwe: 3 Women Charged With Sexual Attacks on 17 Men
